DataElement.preferredName: Medical History Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Neuroblastoma Diagnosis During Enrollment International Neuroblastoma Risk Group Classification System Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The term that specifies the neuroblastoma stage as diagnosed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical History Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Neuroblastoma Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the medical history domain.:4 - PT  V 25.1_The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the medical history domain.

Property.preferredDefinition: 4 - PT  V 25.1_The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: International Neuroblastoma Risk Group Classification System Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A classification system developed to establish a consensus approach for pretreatment risk stratification of neuroblastomas._The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: INRG stage L1 or L2 neuroblastoma with metastatic disease confined to the skin and/or liver and/or bone marrow.

Concepts.definition: INRG stage L1 or L2 neuroblastoma with metastatic disease confined to the skin and/or liver and/or bone marrow.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Neuroblastoma with distant metastatic disease (except MS).

Concepts.definition: Neuroblastoma with distant metastatic disease (except MS).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Locoregional neuroblastoma with one or more image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

Concepts.definition: Locoregional neuroblastoma with one or more image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Locoregional neuroblastoma without image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

Concepts.definition: Locoregional neuroblastoma without image defined risk factors (IDRFs).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.
